Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal was dominant and Emmanuel Clase struggled as the Tigers took game two in Cleveland, 3-0
Kerry Carpenter pounded a rare hanging slider from Clase into the Progressive Field seats in right field
Pre-Game Insights: You can't let Riley Greene and Carpenter beat you
Post-Match Reflections: The Guardians will need a lot more from their lineup if they want to at least get back to Cleveland
The team can pick themselves up off the mat and go try to win two games in Detroit so they don't have to come home and face Skubal again
Miscellaneous Highlights: Matthew Boyd and the Guardians bullpen until Clase entered to close out the 8th was great
The Royals beat the Yankees so every division series is now tied 1-1
Others: The article mentions that the article writer is not worked up over a bad result against the best pitcher of 2024 and one of the top two hitters against RHP this season
